title: Caught Offside: Had it coming
description:
On this week's pod, the boys attempt to harness some of that relentless Aaronson energy as we discuss Marsch's takedown of Tuchel, Newcastle's coming out party vs City, United's triumph over Liverpool and much much more!

itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: United take down Liverpool, Americans shine for Leeds
